amount.description: Amount to be used for this test cash balance transaction. A positive integer representing how much to fund in the [smallest currency unit](https://stripe.com/docs/currencies#zero-decimal) (e.g., 100 cents to fund $1.00 or 100 to fund ¥100, a zero-decimal currency).

currency.description: Three-letter [ISO currency code](https://www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html), in lowercase. Must be a [supported currency](https://stripe.com/docs/currencies).

expand.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

reference.description: A description of the test funding. This simulates free-text references supplied by customers when making bank transfers to their cash balance. You can use this to test how Stripe's [reconciliation algorithm](https://stripe.com/docs/payments/customer-balance/reconciliation) applies to different user inputs.

schema.description: An error response from the Stripe API
